info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:14PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...An area strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Greensville, southeastern Mecklenburg and Brunswick Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alberta, or near Lawrenceville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Hill, Lawrenceville, Brodnax, Purdy, Brunswick, La Crosse, Alberta, Ebony, Cochran, Beechwood, Dolphin, Bowens Corner, Pleasant Shade, Meredithville, Forksville, Bracey, Edgerton, Eppes Fork, Palmer Springs and Rawlings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
